item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple's Software Quality Crisis: When Premium Hardware Meets Subpar Software (68 points | 68 comments)

6. How fast can you open 1000 files? (16 points | 4 comments)
7. Tangled — a git collaboration platform built on atproto (51 points | 16 comments)
8. Use Firefox in 2025 (4 points | no comments)
9. HATETRIS - Obsession, Friendship, and World Records (11 points | 2 comments)
10. illuminant - ActivityPub server with NNTP interface (27 points | 5 comments)
11. The Empty Promise of AI-Generated Creativity (11 points | 8 comments)
12. See yourself, at runtime (11 points | no comments)
13. When declarative systems break (3 points | 1 comment)
14. The Fibrovisor: Turning a dollar store fibre optic wand into a low resolution display (4 points | no comments)
15. polars’ Rgonomic Patterns (6 points | 1 comment)
16. A float walks into a gradual type system (9 points | 3 comments)
17. Begrudgingly choosing CBOR over MessagePack (34 points | 31 comments)
18. Yoke is really cool (31 points | 23 comments)
19. globstar — open-source static analysis toolkit for writing code checkers in YAML and GO (1 points | no comments)
20. What are you doing this week? (5 points | 11 comments)
21. Cleaner codebase, happier mind (15 points | 8 comments)
22. Why I don't do Domain Driven Design (3 points | no comments)
23. Basic Awareness in Addition to Deep Understanding (7 points | 3 comments)
24. sqlite-vec: A vector search for SQLite (6 points | no comments)
25. Effective Rust (34 points | 3 comments)
